name: United Way Bay Area
description: Free, secure, high-quality tax help for low- and middle-income residents across the Bay Area
fullDescription: United Way Bay Area partners with local organizations to provide free, high-quality tax preparation at sites throughout the Bay Area.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free tax preparation at multiple sites
- Service for low to moderate income residents
- Help with EITC and other credits
- IRS-certified volunteers
- Multiple languages available
howToGetIt:
1. Visit United Way Bay Area website
2. Find a free tax preparation site near you
3. Check if appointment is required
4. Gather required documents
5. Get your taxes filed for free
